text.Contract title and description: Payment Exception Service
text.KPI name and description:
Response time to high priority incidents                       
     
The Service Provider will respond to 99.5% of service related incidents and/or requests submitted by the Department within the following time frames: 
 
High Priority: 0-1 hours (during business hours) for issues classified as High priority. High Priority is defined as an issue that affects the Service in respect of issuing or redeeming of vouchers including system outage (PayPoint or Post Office). High priority can also be granted to issues affecting overall system security.
